name: Pygoscelis
description:
A game where you control a butterfly and discover his life's purpose

Dive into this beautful experience, featuring hand-drawn animations and OST

The more you carry, the less colors in the world... "Great achievements always require great sacrifices"

This short experience what made over the course of a week, during the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3:

  • Game design, Code, Art & Animation : Ben Lega
  • Music & SFX : nowereginald

Credits:

  • Code : used personal pre-made code for the Godot project organisation, boid algorithm, camera handler and vector math
  • All arts, animations, effects & sounds where made entirely from scratch during the jam
  • Font : Stardate 81316 Font by Emwedo
